definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: Mary wore handsome go - go boots to the discotheque last night.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗穿著一雙入時的馬靴參加昨晚的舞會。

sentences.english: The Tajik people wear sleeveless jackets, log skirts and riding boots.
sentences.chinese: 塔吉克人喜穿坎肩，長裙，馬靴。

sentences.english: Jodhpurs curved to the waist and velvet vests were snug.
sentences.chinese: 短馬靴中部的彎曲以及天鵝絨馬甲貼身舒適。
